experiment
Class TrialHandler

java.lang.Object
  experiment.TrialHandler

public class TrialHandler
extends java.lang.Object

TrialHandler handles the list of trials for recording and ultimately the output into a JTable.

Author:
krmckelv, Karissa McKelvey

Constructor Summary
TrialHandler(Experiment experiment)
          Creates a new TrialHandler
 
Method Summary
 void add(Trial trial)
          Adds the trial to this trialHandler
 Trial get(int trialNumber)
          Gets the trial from this trialHandler given a trialNumber
 Trial get(Trial trial)
          Gets a trial from this trialHandler given a trial
 void recordHeadings()
          Records the headings for the text file that will be created
 void recordTrials()
          Records the trials into the text file in the following ordeR: Subject, Trial Number, Category, Response, TargetWord, Location, Correct?, Response Time, and Delay
 void run()
          Runs the trial handler, outputs the contents of each trial into a text file that can be loaded into excel in comma-delimited format
 void write(java.lang.String str)
          Writes a string to the file
